testCase.name: getCharacters should return the list of characters
getCharacterById should return the correct character when a valid ID is provided
getCharacterById should throw an error when an invalid ID is provided
renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
renders the correct number of characters when characters array is not empty
renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
CharacterDetail component renders character image, description and modification date
CharacterDetail component renders default description when no description is available
CharacterDetail component renders default modification date when no modification date is available
CharactersList component renders the correct number of characters and a link for each character
CharactersList component renders an empty list when no characters are provided
CharactersList component renders when nothing is provided
